content:
Brookside is still swarming with bees after the events of the festival. The massive cloudhive has settled over what was the festival grounds, and it doesn't look like it's going to be leaving anytime soon.

Search the Old Growth set for a Cloudhive and put it into play. Then search the Old Growth set for two Cloudhive Swarms and shuffle them into the path deck. (If the current terrain is already Old Growth, put the Cloudhive Swarms into play, instead.)
